## Functions

### canonicalizeLowbitMask() {#ac9ae2e49a0bf8f52cd2bac401c001b6c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Instruction &#42; canonicalizeLowbitMask (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator">BinaryOperator</a> &amp; I, InstCombiner::BuilderTy &amp; Builder)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Fold (1 &lt;&lt; NBits) - 1 Into: ~(-(1 &lt;&lt; NBits)) Because a &#39;not&#39; is better for bit-tracking analysis and other transforms than an &#39;add&#39;.

The new shl is always nsw, and is nuw if old <code>and</code> was.

Definition at line <a href="#l01219">1219</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/instcombine/instcombineaddsub-cpp">InstCombineAddSub.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The definition of &lt;Val&gt;     Addends</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// =========================================</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  A + B                     &lt;1, A&gt;, &lt;1,B&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  A - B                     &lt;1, A&gt;, &lt;1,B&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  0 - B                     &lt;-1, B&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  C &#42; A,                    &lt;C, A&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  A + C                     &lt;1, A&gt; &lt;C, NULL&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  0 +/- 0                   &lt;0, NULL&gt; (corner case)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Legend: A and B are not constant, C is constant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-instcombineaddsub-cpp-/faddend/#a2b3d6406d7e75f89f75afce4b23cc012"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-instcombineaddsub-cpp-/faddend/#a2b3d6406d7e75f89f75afce4b23cc012">FAddend::drillValueDownOneStep</a></span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(AddendNum &lt;= 4 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Too many addends&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AddendVect SimpVect;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The outer loop works on one symbolic-value at a time. Suppose the input</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addends are : &lt;a1, x&gt;, &lt;b1, y&gt;, &lt;a2, x&gt;, &lt;c1, z&gt;, &lt;b2, y&gt;, ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The symbolic-values will be processed in this order: x, y, z.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SymIdx = 0; SymIdx &lt; AddendNum; SymIdx++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-instcombineaddsub-cpp-/faddend">FAddend</a> &#42;ThisAddend = Addends&#91;SymIdx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ThisAddend) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This addend was processed before.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Val = ThisAddend-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-instcombineaddsub-cpp-/faddend/#a40b2d97e9f1fba00b45d3bcfce5346f6">getSymVal</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the resulting expr has constant-addend, this constant-addend is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// desirable to reside at the top of the resulting expression tree. Placing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constant close to super-expr(s) will potentially reveal some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimization opportunities in super-expr(s). Here we do not implement</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this logic intentionally and rely on SimplifyAssociativeOrCommutative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// call later.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StartIdx = SimpVect.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SimpVect.push&#95;back(ThisAddend);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The inner loop collects addends sharing same symbolic-value, and these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addends will be later on folded into a single addend. Following above</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// example, if the symbolic value &quot;y&quot; is being processed, the inner loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will collect two addends &quot;&lt;b1,y&gt;&quot; and &quot;&lt;b2,Y&gt;&quot;. These two addends will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be later on folded into &quot;&lt;b1+b2, y&gt;&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SameSymIdx = SymIdx + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">         SameSymIdx &lt; AddendNum; SameSymIdx++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-instcombineaddsub-cpp-/faddend/#a98a8d19d3b1ddbc0930fbbd5c0c37c4c">FAddend</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> = Addends&#91;SameSymIdx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>-&gt;getSymVal() == Val) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set null such that next iteration of the outer loop will not process</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this addend again.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Addends&#91;SameSymIdx&#93; = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SimpVect.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If multiple addends share same symbolic value, fold them together.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StartIdx + 1 != SimpVect.size()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-instcombineaddsub-cpp-/faddend/#a98a8d19d3b1ddbc0930fbbd5c0c37c4c">FAddend</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = TmpResult&#91;NextTmpIdx ++&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = &#42;SimpVect&#91;StartIdx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx = StartIdx + 1; Idx &lt; SimpVect.size(); Idx++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">        R += &#42;SimpVect&#91;Idx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pop all addends being folded and push the resulting folded addend.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SimpVect.resize(StartIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.isZero()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SimpVect.push&#95;back(&amp;R);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((NextTmpIdx &lt;= std::size(TmpResult) + 1) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;out-of-bound access&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SimpVect.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a> = createNaryFAdd(SimpVect, InstrQuota);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The addition is folded to 0.0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a> = ConstantFP::get(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a173a2217e059f21fb25908fa2bf796d6">Instr</a>-&gt;getType(), 0.0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;FAddCombine::createNaryFAdd</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">  (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AddendVect &amp;Opnds, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstrQuota) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!Opnds.empty() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expect at least one addend&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Step 1: Check if the # of instructions needed exceeds the quota.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstrNeeded = calcInstrNumber(Opnds);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InstrNeeded &gt; InstrQuota)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">  initCreateInstNum();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// step 2: Emit the N-ary addition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that at most three instructions are involved in Fadd-InstCombine: the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addition in question, and at most two neighboring instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The resulting optimized addition should have at least one less instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// than the original addition expression tree. This implies that the resulting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// N-ary addition has at most two instructions, and we don&#39;t need to worry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// about tree-height when constructing the N-ary addition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;LastVal = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastValNeedNeg = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Iterate the addends, creating fadd/fsub using adjacent two addends.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-instcombineaddsub-cpp-/faddend/#a98a8d19d3b1ddbc0930fbbd5c0c37c4c">FAddend</a> &#42;Opnd : Opnds) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LastValNeedNeg == NeedNeg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastVal = createFAdd(LastVal, V);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LastValNeedNeg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastVal = createFSub(V, LastVal);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adjust the number of instructions needed to emit the N-ary add.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-instcombineaddsub-cpp-/faddend/#a98a8d19d3b1ddbc0930fbbd5c0c37c4c">FAddend</a> &#42;Opnd : Opnds) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The constant check above is really for a few special constant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// coefficients.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;UndefValue&gt;</a>(Opnd-&gt;getSymVal()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-instcombineaddsub-cpp-/faddendcoef/#a2c31aa596b1c127151a12f5c1ff8721c">FAddendCoef</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/wineh/#a1c8d8103d6b914c2ade85873cb97f6d9a7a86131338bf955e0a56311f264aa6aa">CE</a> = Opnd-&gt;getCoef();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Let the addend be &quot;c &#42; x&quot;. If &quot;c == +/-1&quot;, the value of the addend</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is immediately available; otherwise, it needs exactly one instruction</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/wineh/#a1c8d8103d6b914c2ade85873cb97f6d9a7a86131338bf955e0a56311f264aa6aa">CE</a>.isMinusOne() &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/wineh/#a1c8d8103d6b914c2ade85873cb97f6d9a7a86131338bf955e0a56311f264aa6aa">CE</a>.isOne())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InstrNeeded++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstrNeeded;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Input Addend        Value           NeedNeg(output)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ================================================================</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Constant C          C               false</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;+/-1, V&gt;           V               coefficient is -1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;2/-2, V&gt;          &quot;fadd V, V&quot;      coefficient is -2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;C, V&gt;             &quot;fmul V, C&quot;      false</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE: Keep this function in sync with FAddCombine::calcInstrNumber.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Checks if any operand is negative and we can convert add to sub.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function checks for following negative patterns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ADD(XOR(OR(Z, NOT(C)), C)), 1) == NEG(AND(Z, C))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a014d851989a66ce781c4f89dfffb26b5">m&#95;And</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(Z), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aac9e78b3aa02ec087c4621358f506718">m&#95;APInt</a>(C2))) &amp;&amp; (&#42;C1 == &#42;C2)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// add (sext i1 X), 1 --&gt; zext (not X)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: The smallest IR representation is (select X, 0, 1), and that would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not require the one-use check. But we need to remove a transform in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// visitSelect and make sure that IR value tracking for select is equal or</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1276" lineLink="#a069a4c1f69273f1402ccb7a407e9ee4c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="#a069a4c1f69273f1402ccb7a407e9ee4c">foldAddToAshr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator">BinaryOperator</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aac36edd0f1ce976f0025c98e88d3830eaec211f7c20af43e742bf2570c3cb84f9">Add</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1277"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Division must be by power-of-2, but not the minimum signed value.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1283"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rounding is done by adding -1 if the dividend (X) is negative and has any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// low bits set. It recognizes two canonical patterns:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1286"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 For an &#39;ugt&#39; cmp with the signed minimum value (SMIN), the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    pattern is: sext (icmp ugt (X &amp; (DivC - 1)), SMIN).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 For an &#39;eq&#39; cmp, the pattern&#39;s: sext (icmp eq X &amp; (SMIN + 1), SMIN + 1).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that, by the time we end up here, if possible, ugt has been</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// canonicalized into eq.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &#42;MaskC, &#42;MaskCCmp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1292"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmppredicate">CmpPredicate</a> Pred;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2059"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator">BinaryOperator</a> &#42;Result = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator/#a0fdb430e8a6a952ae71e3a309919d79c">BinaryOperator::CreateFAddFMF</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2060"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We cannot preserve ninf if nnan flag is not set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2061"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If X is NaN and Y is Inf then in original program we had NaN + NaN,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2062"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// while in optimized version NaN + Inf and this is a poison with ninf flag.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2070"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2071"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Optimize pointer differences into the same array into a size.  Consider:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2072"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  &amp;A&#91;10&#93; - &amp;A&#91;0&#93;: we should compile this to &quot;10&quot;.  LHS/RHS are the pointer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2073"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// operands to the ptrtoint instructions for the LHS/RHS of the subtract.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2074" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombinerimpl/#a884253dce055eb76863ec81c061aef33"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombinerimpl/#a884253dce055eb76863ec81c061aef33">InstCombinerImpl::OptimizePointerDifference</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;LHS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;RHS,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2075"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsNUW) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2076"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If LHS is a gep based on RHS or RHS is a gep based on LHS, we can optimize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2077"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2078"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Swapped = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2079"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gepoperator">GEPOperator</a> &#42;GEP1 = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, &#42;GEP2 = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2080"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;GEPOperator&gt;</a>(LHS) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;GEPOperator&gt;</a>(RHS)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2081"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(LHS, RHS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2082"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Swapped = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2083"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2084"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2085"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Require at least one GEP with a common base pointer on both sides.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2086"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;LHSGEP = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;GEPOperator&gt;</a>(LHS)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2087"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (gep X, ...) - X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2088"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHSGEP-&gt;getOperand(0)-&gt;stripPointerCasts() ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2089"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RHS-&gt;stripPointerCasts()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2090"><span class="doxyHighlight">      GEP1 = LHSGEP;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2091"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;RHSGEP = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;GEPOperator&gt;</a>(RHS)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2092"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (gep X, ...) - (gep X, ...)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2093"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHSGEP-&gt;getOperand(0)-&gt;stripPointerCasts() ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2094"><span class="doxyHighlight">          RHSGEP-&gt;getOperand(0)-&gt;stripPointerCasts()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2095"><span class="doxyHighlight">        GEP1 = LHSGEP;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2096"><span class="doxyHighlight">        GEP2 = RHSGEP;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2097"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2098"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2099"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2100"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!GEP1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2103"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To avoid duplicating the offset arithmetic, rewrite the GEP to use the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// computed offset. This may erase the original GEP, so be sure to cache the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nowrap flags before emitting the offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: We should probably do this even if there is only one GEP.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RewriteGEPs = GEP2 != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit the offset of the GEP and an intptr&#95;t.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gepnowrapflags">GEPNoWrapFlags</a> GEP1NW = GEP1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gepoperator/#a9f19d28f31c79215e0e0190115b0373d">getNoWrapFlags</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Result = EmitGEPOffset(GEP1, RewriteGEPs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is a single inbounds GEP and the original sub was nuw,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then the final multiplication is also nuw.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(Result))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsNUW &amp;&amp; !GEP2 &amp;&amp; !Swapped &amp;&amp; GEP1NW.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gepnowrapflags/#aaba6873d157dbd7f5f02da723e6ca78f">isInBounds</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2118"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getOpcode() == Instruction::Mul)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2119"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;setHasNoUnsignedWrap();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2120"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have a 2nd GEP of the same base pointer, subtract the offsets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If both GEPs are inbounds, then the subtract does not have signed overflow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If both GEPs are nuw and the original sub is nuw, the new sub is also nuw.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2437"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Turn this into a xor if LHS is 2^n-1 and the remaining bits are known</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2438"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// zero. We don&#39;t use information from dominating conditions so this</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2559"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> m&#95;SubXorCmp = &#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;LHS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;RHS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2560"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(LHS, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a5be13f3abb6bddf7ad9747b077da5a0e">m&#95;OneUse</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a4e2ffa92003f2eca82197ea662b30f16">m&#95;c&#95;Xor</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a2d9861feadd3a09792967a012559e7b2">m&#95;Specific</a>(RHS)))) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2576"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2577"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have a subtraction between some value and a select between</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2578"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// said value and something else, sink subtraction into select hands, i.e.:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2579"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   sub (select %Cond, %TrueVal, %FalseVal), %Op1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2580"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     -&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2581"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   select %Cond, (sub %TrueVal, %Op1), (sub %FalseVal, %Op1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2582"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2583"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   sub %Op0, (select %Cond, %TrueVal, %FalseVal)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2584"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     -&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2585"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   select %Cond, (sub %Op0, %TrueVal), (sub %Op0, %FalseVal)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2586"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This will result in select between new subtraction and 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2587"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SinkSubIntoSelect =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2588"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#91;Ty = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getType()&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregbankselect-cpp/#a09bc27545df3b02401428427d0b5ce6f">Select</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;OtherHandOfSub,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2589"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SubBuilder) -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2590"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>, &#42;TrueVal, &#42;FalseVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2591"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregbankselect-cpp/#a09bc27545df3b02401428427d0b5ce6f">Select</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a5be13f3abb6bddf7ad9747b077da5a0e">m&#95;OneUse</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a3ccd94f6a7507492b47c7351e3fb78c6">m&#95;Select</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(TrueVal),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2592"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(FalseVal)))))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2593"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2594"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OtherHandOfSub != TrueVal &amp;&amp; OtherHandOfSub != FalseVal)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2595"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2596"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// While it is really tempting to just create two subtractions and let</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2597"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InstCombine fold one of those to 0, it isn&#39;t possible to do so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2598"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because of worklist visitation order. So ugly it is.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2599"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OtherHandOfSubIsTrueVal = OtherHandOfSub == TrueVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2600"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;NewSub = SubBuilder(OtherHandOfSubIsTrueVal ? FalseVal : TrueVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2601"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;Zero = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant/#aa6574d526b3e38a28f688a7bb4325c2c">Constant::getNullValue</a>(Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2602"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectinst">SelectInst</a> &#42;NewSel =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2603"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectinst/#a09d8760fa31a7b8739acf71a4d2ac9d9">SelectInst::Create</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>, OtherHandOfSubIsTrueVal ? Zero : NewSub,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2604"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             OtherHandOfSubIsTrueVal ? NewSub : Zero);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2605"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Preserve prof metadata if any.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2606"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewSel-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#aec6eaa1e49f48c178e0ab9c030b5971e">copyMetadata</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregbankselect-cpp/#a09bc27545df3b02401428427d0b5ce6f">Select</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2607"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewSel;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2608"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2609"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;NewSel = SinkSubIntoSelect(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2610"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Select=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight">Op0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;OtherHandOfSub=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight">Op1,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2623"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2624"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2625"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (X - (X &amp; Y))   --&gt;   (X &amp; ~Y)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2626"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(Op1, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a1981217907f3dfb1d21e902d0396fb4d">m&#95;c&#95;And</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a2d9861feadd3a09792967a012559e7b2">m&#95;Specific</a>(Op0), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>))) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2627"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (Op1-&gt;hasOneUse() || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;Constant&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2628"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BinaryOperator::CreateAnd(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2629"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Op0, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#ae1d331bc844ecb92bdeb0b706ae04396">Builder</a>.CreateNot(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>-&gt;getName() + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.not&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2630"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2631"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ~X - Min/Max(~X, Y) -&gt; ~Min/Max(X, ~Y) - X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2632"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ~X - Min/Max(Y, ~X) -&gt; ~Min/Max(X, ~Y) - X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2633"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Min/Max(~X, Y) - ~X -&gt; X - ~Min/Max(X, ~Y)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2634"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Min/Max(Y, ~X) - ~X -&gt; X - ~Min/Max(X, ~Y)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2635"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As long as Y is freely invertible, this will be neutral or a win.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: We don&#39;t generate the inverse max/min, just create the &#39;not&#39; of</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2684"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Canonicalize a shifty way to code absolute value to the common pattern.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2685"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are 2 potential commuted variants.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2686"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;re relying on the fact that we only do this transform when the shift has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2687"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exactly 2 uses and the xor has exactly 1 use (otherwise, we might increase</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2688"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2689"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2690"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &#42;ShAmt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2691"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getType();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2693"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(Op1, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a0c94f3ca4234f78cf22840e79087f3f2">m&#95;AShr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aac9e78b3aa02ec087c4621358f506718">m&#95;APInt</a>(ShAmt))) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2696"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// B = ashr i32 A, 31 ; smear the sign bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2697"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sub (xor A, B), B  ; flip bits if negative and subtract -1 (add 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2698"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// --&gt; (A &lt; 0) ? -A : A</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2699"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;IsNeg = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#ae1d331bc844ecb92bdeb0b706ae04396">Builder</a>.CreateIsNeg(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2965"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Subtraction from 0 is the canonical form of fneg.</span></CodeLine>
